task.title: Add app version metadata and in-app changelog display
task.author: user

steps.summary: Requested app version display (version number/date) and a changelog that can be shown in the app.
Reviewed shared templates and app handlers to see how base pages are rendered and where to inject version/changelog info. Evidence: shared/templates/base.go, apps/*/handlers/*.go.
Use config.yaml for version metadata and a per-app changelog.yaml parsed into a simple list, displayed via a new /changelog route. Chose YAML for easy agent updates without adding markdown rendering.
Added config/changelog loaders in shared/models, footer display in shared templates, and per-app changelog routes/data injection.

Updated app configs with version metadata and added changelog.yaml files; updated app template files to scaffold version/changelog support. Touched: shared/models/*, shared/templates/base.go, shared/templates/custom.css, apps/todo-list/*, apps/projects/*, templates/app-template/*.

final_summary: Added version metadata and changelog support via config/changelog YAML, updated shared templates to show version/footer link, and introduced /changelog pages plus scaffolding updates for new apps.
